price: Ni na bo batabangikanya Allah n’izindi mana, ntibice icyo Allah yaziririje bitanyuze mu kuri, kandi ntibanasambane. Kandi ukora ibyo azahura n’ibihano (bibabaza).
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَدۡعُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ وَلَا يَقۡتُلُونَ ٱلنَّفۡسَ ٱلَّتِي حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا يَزۡنُونَۚ وَمَن يَفۡعَلۡ ذَٰلِكَ يَلۡقَ أَثَامٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna lā yadʿūna maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara walā yaqtulūna al-nafsa allatī ḥarrama al-lahu illā bil-ḥaqi walā yaznūna waman yafʿal dhālika yalqa athāman
